text:
hi guys today I'm going to show you how
to fillet a fish
put your gutted fish on the edge of the cutting board like this you start cutting a fish just behind the
front fin towards the top of the head now you put your hand into the empty belly of the fish and hold it firmly

cut horizontally into the fish above the backbone
until the middle bone where the belly ends at
this side the fishbone will be flat so here you stick your knife through the fillet of the fish and
so hold the belly side and the fillet side together and I cut it through
to this side, then I move my knife to the end of the fillet

and there it is guys a fillet of round fish so the
last step is to trim your fillet and repeat the

same thing at the other side so guys this
is filleting fish easy and fun to do if

you want to see more tips click on the
link
